item.title: Project I: Customer revenue
item.description: Worked with 51243 observations of customer purchases to a business. Each of these observations has three variables: customer_id, purchase amount and the date of purchase. From the data of purchase I extracted the year and the days since the purchase was made. With the use of the sqldf library, which allows the manipulation of a dataframe with SQL queries, I grouped the last day of purchase and the average amount of purchase of the customers with the same ID.
